title: Surya: The God and his Abode
description: The God & his Abode is highly valuable for the new light it throws on ‘Surya’. This an excellent source of information on the Sun Temples and a cultural asset as it depicts seven of the sun temples. The sun temples portrayed in the book are Arsāvalli (Andhra Pradesh); Deo (Bihar); Goalpārā (Assam); Katārmal (Uttarakhnd); Konārk (Orissa); Modherā (Gujrat) and Wat Arun (Bangkok, Thailand).
author: Ranjan Kumar  Singh
